name: @ziadkh0/flow-comments
description: A simple CLI that wraps/unwraps flow type annotations in comments

scripts.test: (npm run -s test:ava && npm run -s test:cli && npm run -s finallytest) || (npm run -s finallytest; false)
scripts.test:cli: cp test/fixtures/wrapped.js test/fixtures/temp_1.js && cp test/fixtures/wrapped.js test/fixtures/temp_2.js && src/cli.js unwrap 'test/fixtures/temp_*.js' && diff --to-file=test/fixtures/unwrapped.js test/fixtures/temp_*.js > /dev/null
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && git push && git push --tags

author: Ziad EL KHOURY HANNA
